Locations

We operate from an unusual location.

Our locally-sourced food can only be found in the beautiful city of Lexington, Kentucky.

Mailing Address

348 E. Main Street
Lexington, KY 40507

Hours of Operation

Wednesday through Saturday
Dinner only: 5pm - 10pm
Sunday
Brunch and Dinner: 11am - 8pm
